func.title: Music

param.name: song_name
param.desc: Filename of the music track. The file extension must be specified. If unspecified, music playback will be interrupted.

param.name: loop
param.desc: If 1, the specified track will be looped forever.

param.name: fadetime_ms
param.desc: Fading time between any currently playing piece and the newly selected song. Ignored if both are the same. Set to zero to avoid fading.

param.name: resume_time_ms
param.desc: If greater than zero, the upcoming piece is resumed from the position where it last stopped playing if at least this amount of time is still left to be played.

func.desc: Plays a music track. The corresponding music file must be available in the active music group. If the loaded scenario contains music files, the scenario file will be the music group. Otherwise, the global file Music.ocg will be used.
